Who We Are...

Alekhya, an exemplary initiative to exhibit the marvellous talents in the corridors of GEC. It enables to cast the spotlight on the hidden masterminds and to bring out the fantabulous artworks. Frames of Alekhya portrays the frameless imagination of the artists.

GEC Arts Club

Govt. Engineering Collage, Palakkad
